select.if: SELECT *, ( follow + wz + sp + issue ) AS total FROM ( SELECT IFNULL( b.id, '' ) AS user_id, IFNULL( b.head_portrait, '' ) AS head_portrait, IFNULL( b.NAME, '' ) AS NAME, ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS follow FROM common_follow WHERE follow_flag = '1' AND object_id = a.spec_id ) AS 'follow', ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS 'wz' FROM common_collection cc INNER JOIN spec_article sa ON cc.collect_object_id = sa.id WHERE cc.collect_type = '2' AND sa.STATUS = '0' AND sa.spec_id = a.spec_id ) AS 'wz', ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS 'sp' FROM common_collection cc INNER JOIN train_video_course tvc ON cc.collect_object_id = tvc.id WHERE cc.collect_type = '5' AND tvc.STATUS = '0' AND tvc.spec_id = a.spec_id ) AS 'sp', ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS issue FROM spec_issue_association WHERE ( is_assigned = '0' OR is_assigned = '1' ) AND specid = a.spec_id ) AS 'issue' FROM spec_info a INNER JOIN common_user b ON a.spec_id = b.id ) AS temp ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 0, 10

SELECT *, ( follow + wz + sp + issue ) AS total FROM ( SELECT IFNULL( b.id, '' ) AS user_id, IFNULL( b.head_portrait, '' ) AS head_portrait, IFNULL( b.NAME, '' ) AS NAME, ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS follow FROM common_follow WHERE follow_flag = '1' AND object_id = a.spec_id ) AS 'follow', ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS 'wz' FROM common_collection cc INNER JOIN spec_article sa ON cc.collect_object_id = sa.id WHERE cc.collect_type = '2' AND sa.STATUS = '0' AND sa.spec_id = a.spec_id ) AS 'wz', ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS 'sp' FROM common_collection cc INNER JOIN train_video_course tvc ON cc.collect_object_id = tvc.id WHERE cc.collect_type = '5' AND tvc.STATUS = '0' AND tvc.spec_id = a.spec_id ) AS 'sp', ( SELECT count( 1 ) AS issue FROM spec_issue_association WHERE ( is_assigned = '0' OR is_assigned = '1' ) AND specid = a.spec_id ) AS 'issue' FROM spec_info a INNER JOIN common_user b ON a.spec_id = b.id ) AS temp ORDER BY total DESC , user_id DESC

mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM train_live WHERE id IN ( SELECT object_id FROM train_appointment WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND object_type = 1 ) ) AS zb, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM train_video_course WHERE id IN ( SELECT object_id FROM train_appointment WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND object_type = 2 ) ) AS px, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM train_video_course WHERE spec_id = #{user_id} ) AS sp, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM spec_article WHERE STATUS = '0' AND spec_id = #{user_id} ) AS wz

SELECT ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM spec_issue a LEFT JOIN spec_issue_association b ON a.id = b.issueid LEFT JOIN spec_info c ON b.specid = c.spec_id WHERE b.specid = #{user_id} AND issue_time >= #{start_time} AND issue_time <= #{end_time} ) AS askme, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM spec_issue a LEFT JOIN spec_issue_association b ON a.id = b.issueid LEFT JOIN spec_info c ON b.specid = c.spec_id WHERE b.specid = #{user_id} AND ( issue_status = '2' OR issue_status = '3' ) AND issue_time >= #{start_time} AND issue_time <= #{end_time} ) AS solve, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM spec_issue a LEFT JOIN spec_issue_association b ON a.id = b.issueid LEFT JOIN spec_info c ON b.specid = c.spec_id WHERE b.specid = #{user_id} AND ( is_public = '1' ) AND issue_time >= #{start_time} AND issue_time <= #{end_time} ) AS public
